page.title: 15SHOPPING SURVEY
page.content:
Over 3 days 100 shoppers were questioned on their shopping habits. Results are shown as follows:-
Distance travelled to {Clydeview {Centre less than 1 mile 38% between 1-3 miles 48% more than 3 miles 14%
Other questions in the survey showed that the centre was used mainly for purchase of foodstuffs. When shoppers were questioned about major non-food purchases it became obvious that most people travelled to neighbouring towns to shop.
The opening of the Centre changed the previous shopping habits in the area. Several local shops closed as a result, including 2 supermarkets.
